content: Taking Maker from hover to full transition in less than a year receiving an industry first $10 million non-refundable pre-delivery payment on 100 aircrafts from United Airlines; announcing with United Airlines, the first commercial electric air taxi route in the U.S. from downtown Manhattan to Newark Liberty International Airport; unveiling our production aircraft Midnight at our Open House event in the Bay Area that included a flight test experience, and announcing the industryâs first high volume eVTOL manufacturing facility in Covington, Georgia.
